about_the_game:
Fear Of Mine Is Kinetic Visual Novel.
We're planning to release 10 chapters for the game; One of them are already out for you to enjoy.

In the year 2040, the mining industry is struggling due to a shortage of tools caused by various crises around the world. However, a cutting-edge company known as X-Company has developed advanced nano-tools to meet the demands of the industry.
The main characters of the story are the miners of the future, who are tasked with working in an anomalous mine where ominous experiments were once conducted. The mine is haunted by the past horrors that occurred within its walls, and the scientists who conducted the experiments have long since become monsters themselves. But even they couldn't have predicted the true terror that would be unleashed when they opened Pandora's box.

✔ Linear story but interactive.
✔ We will tell a story that was once a series on Youtube.
✔ Unexpected plot twists.
✔ Mysterious story.
✔ There is our own universe, which we plan to develop.
✔ Original, soundtrack immersing in the atmosphere of the game.
